DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial demonstrate faster recovery neuromuscular block induce 1.2 mg/kg ZemuronÂ® reversal 3 minute 16.0 mg/kg Org 25969 compare recovery neuromuscular block induce 1.0 mg/kg succinylcholine .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Recovery From Rocuronium 1.2 mg/kg Followed By Org 25969 16 mg/kg 3 Minutes With Recovery From Succinylcholine 1.0 mg/kg ( 19.4.303 ) ( P05946 )
DOC.criteria: ASA Class 1 2 ; 18 65 year age ( inclusive ) ; Scheduled elective surgical procedure general anesthesia require short duration neuromuscular block use rocuronium succinylcholine require endotracheal intubation ; Scheduled surgery supine position ; Body mass index ( BMI ) < 30 ; Given write informed consent . Subjects ischemic heart disease history myocardial infarction within last year ; Subjects difficult intubation expect due anatomical malformation ; Subjects know suspect neuromuscular disorder impair neuromuscular blockade and/or significant renal dysfunction ; Subjects know suspect ( family ) history malignant hyperthermia ; Subjects know suspect allergy narcotic , muscle relaxant , midazolam , anesthetic medication use surgery ; Subjects receive medication know interfere neuromuscular block agent anticonvulsant , antibiotic Mg2+ ; Subjects use neostigmine and/or glycopyrrolate may contraindicate ; Female subject pregnant breastfeeding ; Females subject childbearing potential use acceptable method birth control [ condom diaphragm spermicide , vasectomized partner ( > 6 month ) , IUD , abstinence ] ; Subjects already participate Org 25969 trial include Protocol 19.4.303 ;
